General.Name: Shenzhen Bestek Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Bestek Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of smart controllers and products in China and internationally. Its products include lithium battery intelligent control protection devices and motor controllers; and smart sensor lamps. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Haijian  Li
1.Title: Financial Controller, Board Sec. & Non-Independent Director
